Welcome to this simple coin Game


There are 3 games to choose from :

  1. One Flip

    Simulates just a single coin toss

  2. Multiple Flips

    Simulates multiple coin tosses

  3. Guess a result of a coin toss

    Simulates result of a single coin toss


Please pick one of the games from above to play from the above.
